name: Light the Way (itch) (SpyderByteStudios)
description:
A terrible storm is brewing and you're far from your home.

Blusterous winds, torrential rain, blinding lightning and all in pitch blackness.

You must utilise the same forces of nature that you seek to escape if you want to make it from helter to shelter.

Arrow Keys Move Up / Space / Z Jump / Double Jump Enter Pause

Light the Way was made in 5 hours for TriJam #158. I'd recommend the Windows version since it seems to run a little smoother than the HTML export.

Thanks to everyone who took the time to play!
